title: Why They’re Not ‘The One’ | Relationship Theory
description: In this week’s episode of Relationship Theory, Tom and Lisa talk about the idea of “the one” and the importance of keeping your values in a relationship. If you have a question you’d like us to answer on the podcast, you can email us at connect@impacttheory.com Check out our awesome sponsors!
